title: Souryuuden (Legend of the Dragon Kings)
synopsis: The four Ryudo brothers hold an ancient secret -  they are descended from the dragons. They have the speed, strength and  power of their legendary ancestors - and they're getting stronger. But when pushed to the limit, they become the terrifying, uncontrollable dragons of mythology. These powers have attracted the attention of some powerful enemies - shadowy organizations with unlimited resources and weapons who will stop at nothing to control the brothers.
characters: ['Ryudo, Hajime', 'Ryudo, Amaru', 'Ryudo, Tsuzuku', 'Ryudo, Owaru', 'Mizuchi, Masahiko', 'Prime Minister', 'Dr. Tamozawa', 'Toba, Matsuri']
voices: ['Hori, Hideyuki', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Nakamura, Daiki', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Takiguchi, Junpei', 'Tamagawa, Sakiko']
